title: Average Rate of Change
text: We calculate the average rate of change using AROC $$=$$ [f(x+h)-f(x)]/h, which is the same as the slope of the line connecting these $$2$$ points.

title: Derivative
text: We calculate the derivative using lim h→0 $$\frac{f{\left(x+h\right)}-f{\left(x\right)}}{h}$$, which is the same formula as AROC, except we take the limit as $$h$$ approaches $$0$$

title: Limit Meaning
text: This limit compresses $$x+h$$ to $$x$$, so that we are able to find the instantaneous rate of change at $$x$$.
